postDeleteAlert: The post will be permanently deleted.
meetingDeleteAlert: The Meeting will be permanently deleted.
withdraw_offer_warning: This action will withdraw the offer made to the beneficiary.
interestAlert: At least one selection is required to save.
messages_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
rate_experience_desc: How clear and appropriate the assistant’s guidance was, its ability to simplify the path, and provide practical, actionable steps rather than just general advice.
rate_commitment_desc: The assistant’s level of commitment to follow-up, responsiveness in a timely manner, ability to motivate, and provide feedback during task execution.
rate_quality_desc: The amount of positive change in understanding, ability to execute, or the quality of tasks and outcomes, compared to working on the plan without the assistant’s collaboration.
rate_respect_desc: The assistant’s adherence to high professional standards, such as respecting time, maintaining confidentiality, providing clear and high-quality communication, and building a positive trust-based relationship.
rate_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
renew_message: You have requested to extend your contract
renew_error: An error occurred while withdrawing the request.
renew_request_error: An error occurred while submitting your request.
assistant_success: Your assistant request has been sent successfully!
assistant_error: An error occurred while submitting your request.
contract_accept_success: The contract has been accepted successfully.
steps_description: From start to success — Tasami helps you define your goals, connect with the right assistant, and stay on track until you achieve the results you aim for.
steps_browse_desc: Explore the available tasks and services to clearly understand what you need.
steps_request_desc: Write your goal in detail and specify your requirements clearly.
steps_choose_desc: Receive offers from qualified assistants and select the one that best fits your needs.
steps_start_desc: Begin implementing your plan and achieve your goals with ongoing support.
steps_review_desc: Don’t forget to rate your experience and share your success story with others.
aim_description: Our platform meets your needs — whether you are a beneficiary striving to achieve your goals, or a personal assistant supporting others toward success.
aim_beneficiary_desc: An essential platform to achieve your goals efficiently and effectively within a supportive, motivating community.
aim_assistant_desc: A unique platform to help ambitious individuals overcome challenges and reach their goals.
about_description: Your specialized platform for achieving goals with professional support and an innovative social experience.
about_main_paragraph1: Tasami is a website and mobile app that connects users seeking or offering personal assistance services to achieve goals across more than 300 fields and specialties. Contracts are established between parties through structured social agreements, often involving paid engagements.
about_main_paragraph2: The platform provides integrated work models to help achieve goals based on the SCORE framework.
why_description: Tasami is more than a platform — it’s a supportive community and a powerful tool to help you achieve your goals.
why_item1_desc: Start your journey with clear plans and achievable goals, backed by continuous expert support. Face challenges with confidence and follow structured steps toward tangible, lasting success.
why_item2_desc: Benefit from a network of specialized expertise and innovative opportunities that open new paths for growth. Gain new knowledge and develop your professional and personal skills with the help of top experts.
why_item3_desc: Join a diverse community driven by ambition, creativity, and mutual encouragement. Find people who inspire and support your aspirations while exchanging experiences that open new horizons and ongoing opportunities.
why_item4_desc: We provide an integrated platform that helps you organize your work and track your goals efficiently. With user-friendly tools and intelligent systems, you can complete your tasks on time and meet high professional standards.
contact_description: You can contact us directly by filling out the following form:
no_group_title: No personal assistant assigned to this goal!
no_group_description: Assign a personal assistant to benefit from Tasami’s professional tools designed to boost productivity, build competencies, and support social learning.
validation_message_or_file: You must write a message or attach a file
chat_contract_ended_message: You cannot participate in this conversation because the contract has ended.
group_chat_hint: This is a group chat — your messages are visible to everyone.
enable_mic_permission: Please enable microphone permission for audio recording
goalDeleteWarning: The goal will be permanently deleted from your task list
noPendingContracts: No pending contracts at the moment
enableMicPermission: Please enable microphone permission to record audio
groupChatNotice: This is a group chat — your messages are visible to everyone
messageOrFileRequired: You must write a message or attach a file
confirmBlockMessage: Are you sure you want to block this user? They will lose access immediately.
confirmUnblockMessage: Are you sure you want to unblock this user? They will regain access.

offline.title: No Internet Connection
offline.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

footer.description: A smart Arabic platform that helps you turn your goals into realistic, actionable plans, supported by inspiring assistants and motivating communities, enabling you to achieve your ambitions with confidence and skill, and complete your tasks with high professionalism.

platform.hint: This platform provides a set of tools to manage your business and activities as a personal assistant professionally, and to deliver the best experience for your clients.
platform.header: Create a Basic Personal Assistant Account - (Free)
platform.title: Welcome to the Community of Inspirers at 'Tasami'
platform.description1: Your personal assistant account allows you to publish assistance programs and offer services to others. You can also create workgroups as virtual spaces for social learning, as well as activate your own channels to publish exclusive content and receive membership subscriptions within the 'Personal Assistant Community'!
platform.description2: By continuing, you commit that the assistance services you provide through the Tasami platform will not violate the regulations and laws in the country of operation, and you also commit to fulfilling all regulatory requirements determined by the relevant authorities whenever required.
platform.alertMessage: Please complete your CV to activate the account.

deleteAccountModal.sorryToSeeYouGo: We regret your decision to leave Tasami and draw your attention to the fact that this action will permanently delete your account
deleteAccountModal.beforeProceeding: Before proceeding, please note that account deletion is only possible after meeting the following requirements
deleteAccountModal.noActiveContractsDescription: You must ensure that all active contracts have ended, whether with beneficiaries or personal assistants
deleteAccountModal.stopPersonalAssistantCommunity: Second: Stop your personal assistant community (if any):
deleteAccountModal.stopCommunityDescription: If you have an active community with paid subscriptions, you must first stop the community, then wait a full 30 days after stopping it to ensure all obligations towards members have ended
deleteAccountModal.withdrawBalanceDescription: Any remaining balance in the wallet must be withdrawn to your bank account before proceeding with account deletion
deleteAccountModal.verifyRequirements: After verifying all the mentioned conditions, you can successfully complete the account deletion process
deleteAccountModal.irreversibleActionWarning: This process is final and irreversible, and all your account-related data will be permanently deleted
